intro: Explore dark corridors and uncover the mysteries within.
description:
Step into the eerie, endless maze of ESCAPE THE BACKROOMS, where reality bends and every corner hides a new threat. Navigate through dimly lit corridors, solve cryptic puzzles, and avoid sinister entities that lurk in the shadows. Each level challenges your wits, nerves, and survival instincts as you attempt to find the exit before it’s too late.
Features:
•	Terrifying Exploration: Immerse yourself in endless, randomly generated backrooms filled with unsettling details.
•	Clever Puzzles: Solve challenging puzzles to unlock doors, passageways, and secrets.
•	Hide and Survive: Evade hostile entities that stalk your every move.
•	Atmospheric Horror: Experience tense sound design, flickering lights, and a creeping sense of dread.
Can you escape the backrooms, or will you become another lost soul wandering the endless maze?
